channel.title: Gather on Lost in the tidyverse
channel.description: Recent content in Gather on Lost in the tidyverse

item.title: Using the tidyverse tidyr package to make wide datasets tall
item.description: Import seattle rain gauge dataset library(tidyverse) ## ── Attaching packages ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.2.1 ── ## ✔ ggplot2 3.0.0 ✔ purrr 0.2.5 ## ✔ tibble 1.4.2 ✔ dplyr 0.7.6 ## ✔ tidyr 0.8.1 ✔ stringr 1.3.1 ## ✔ readr 1.1.1 ✔ forcats 0.3.0 ## ── Conflicts ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ── ## ✖ dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() ## ✖ dplyr::lag() masks stats::lag() seattle_rain <- read_csv("Observed_Monthly_Rain_Gauge_Accumulations_Oct_2002_to_May_2017.csv") ## Parsed with column specification: ## cols( ## Date = col_character(), ## RG01 = col_double(), ## RG02 = col_double(), ## RG03 = col_double(), ## RG04 = col_double(), ## RG05 = col_double(), ## RG07 = col_double(), ## RG08 = col_double(), ## RG09 = col_double(), ## RG10_30 = col_double(), ## RG11 = col_double(), ## RG12 = col_double(), ## RG14 = col_double(), ## RG15 = col_double(), ## RG16 = col_double(), ## RG17 = col_double(), ## RG18 = col_double(), ## RG20_25 = col_double() ## ) Display Monthly Rain Gauge Accumulations for Seattle seattle_rain ## # A tibble: 175 x 18 ## Date RG01 RG02 RG03 RG04 RG05 RG07 RG08 RG09 RG10_30 RG11 ## <chr> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> ## 1 11/3… 2.
